name: RiffinwithRaffa
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Riffin' with Raffa offers a novelty perspective on a wide range of topics. Touching upon ideas and events both in society at large and her personal life. Its weird, its funny, its honest, its genuine. What more could you ask for? To make this apart of your evreyday life, download the skill and enable it to your flash briefing. Then, simply ask "Alexa, what's in the news today?" or "Alexa, play my flash briefing."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
